query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as produtos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes_mercados) as associacoes;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as produtos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as concorrentes,
